title: Waco Mammoth National Monument: Education
body: Waco Mammoth Really "Digs" Kids!  Waco Mammoth National Monument is a classroom 67,000 years in the making. Plan a field trip that will enhance your students' learning. All educational activities at the Monument are aligned with the Texas Essential Knowledge and Skills program (TEKS).                 Bring Your Students to Waco Mammoth Find resources for planning your own trip. Read More        Add-On Programs Choose from a variety of optional add-on programs to enhance your educational experience at Waco Mammoth National Monument! Read More        Bring Waco Mammoth into your classroom! Review our ever-growing lesson plans and curricula designed for primary school through high school. Coming Soon! Read More
